content.detailedDescription:
I'm not crazy. i am an educated, business professional who owns his own business. i never reported this to anyone, because i was afraid of the ridicule that i knew would come from telling my story, and because my memory surrounding this incident been so unclear. 

i definitely saw this thing ��� it's image is forever burned into my memory, and i still have nightmares about it, increasingly so, it seems ��� but everything after the initial moment of the sighting remains an absolute blur, including the exact time, date and location. i remember that i was driving with someone ��� my ex-wife, i think, but i honestly don't remember who. i do know that we were southbound on colorado highway 287.  the location was a few miles north of the old saw mill, just north of a convenience store called "ted's place." i believe it was somewhere between 5:00 and 7:00 pm, and visibility was excellent. i got a very good look at the thing. 

i remember coming around a curve in the road and suddenly seeing a shockingly large delta wing or boomerang shaped object in the sky...Judging by the landmarks, maybe 1/2 to 3/4 mile at its widest point...Hovering above the cliff to my left. i served with the 4th marine aircraft wing, so i have been around all kinds of aircraft...Even some classified military aircraft...And i can tell you that it was nothing like anything that i had ever seen before, or since. the closest thing that i have ever seen to this was called the yb-49 flying wing...Only this thing was gargantuan and had no sign of an engine of anykind, anywhere, and it made no sound that i could hear...And it was just hanging there, hovering. the ufo had a much more pronounced "v" shape, and no fuselage or tail fins at all.

at the time i owned some land in the area, and it frightened me that this occurred so close to my property...Virtually, in my backyard. i had hiked all up and down those hills and cliffs in the area, both hunting and photographing wildlife, so i was very familiar with the area. this has haunted me for years, and i would like to know more about it. i am willing to be hypnotized, if it will help me to remember the incident. 

regards,
content.summary: Large boomerang shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: Maybe a ufo, i do not know.
content.summary: Do not know what it is....Anyone can  comments?

content.detailedDescription: on saturday the 24th of may at around 11pm i was outside having a smoke and relaxing after work.  i always look up at the stars in hopes of seeing a shooting star or the northern lights and i aw these 2 balls/points of lights moving slowly across the sky.  i thought they may have been a high flying plane but there was no sound and no running lights.  as they got closer to being overhead the two lights split into opposite directions and took off very fast, i followed them till they were out of sight.  i was not suprised or scared but more at peace with the experience.  i immediatly went inside and sent an emailk to mufon's bill olinger.  the objects initally were travelling ne and when they split they went nw and se.
content.summary: Twin balls of lights travelling together split into opposite directions at fast speeds

content.detailedDescription: I was doing a drawing project for art class outside. i was drawing a tree. then when i looked up i saw a ufo! a disk shape.
content.summary: A ufo sighted in fisher in

content.detailedDescription:
As i was stargazing & smoking (sorry!)on a clear cool evening,an object appeared above me that came from the east. it was a definate triangle shape w/dim,pale orange chevron shaped lights (about 9-12?) within the triangle. it was very pale.I could tell there was a black underlay in a triangle shape. 
this was a thing that did not want to be seen.

it was above me for a good 15-18 seconds (hard to say-i was stunned) after i first spotted it. as i was trying to wrap my head around what i was seeing-going thru all the options-a flock of geese-yet there was no sunlight to reflect off thier wings, and they were stationary-hovering. i dont think geese can do that! a stealth bomber-no. a kite? no!

i have no concept of how high up it was could have been 100 feet or 10k-no idea! i dont know what the scale/size of it was. it happened too quick! 
 when i grasped the idea that it was an actual ufo-i gasped & took in breath, there seemed to be a moment of recognition between me & the craft (?...I can't explain the feeling) the craft then made a very quiet brief hum, like vvv and took off at incredible speed to the west. it was gone in the blink of an eye. this is my first sighting of any ufo. i am very excited!
content.summary: Dimly lit triangle with multiple chevron lights

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving west on oh rt 6 just east of miner rd when i noticed a bright circular light, like an airplane headlight, in the western sky below and to the left of my view of the big dipper. there were no flashing lights/beacons anywhere around this light like an airplane would have. i looked up again and watched as the light dimmed. like someone had turned down a light fixture with a dimmer. 
  in approximately 10-15 seconds the light had dimmed from looking like an airplane light to about the size of a star. i looked down at the road and when i looked back the light was gone. there were still no flashing lights in the area where i last saw the light. there is a small regional airport a few miles from where i was, but planes approaching or departing from there are so low when they pass where i was that there is no mistaking them for what they are. 
  the light appeared to be close to the flight path for arrivals into cleveland-hopkins aiport(the path follows i-90) but the light was facing in the wrong direction, as if it was a departing flight.  
  i'm willing to believe i could have seen a plane turning it's light off but what bothers me is that there were absolutely no flashing airplane lights in the sky after the light dimmed. also, i tried to locate the light as i continued driving and there were no airplane lights anywhere nearby.
content.summary: Bright circular light dimmed then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were on his deck just socializing and saw a bright sphere light up and then seconds later a second one close by lite up. both of them were extremly bright. this was in broad saylight with a perfectly clear sky. the both moved at a high rate of speed and were stationary at times. they both just disappeared with mo trace. they were so bright it could be best described as bright as a blow tourch
content.summary: 2 balls of light that were the brightest white ive ever seen in broad day light

content.detailedDescription:
May 2000 sighting of object over lake superior:

my wife and i live in new brighton, minnesota, which is a northren suburb of the twin cities (minneapolis/st. paul).  every few weeks or months for the last decade, we've made numerous overnight trips to north-central wisconsin, or the north shore of lake superior.  we enjoy the beauty of the lake and country around the area of washburn and ashland, in particular.  when laura and i travel to north-central wisconsin, we almost always stay at the americinn on the east side of ashland, next to lake superior.

on a may morning about eight years ago, i got up shortly after dawn and went out to the north patio of the ashland americinn to sip some coffee and smoke a cigarette.  as i lit my cigarette, i scanned the lake for boats and ships, noting very few.  but my attention was attracted to what i at first took to be a bird spiraling up from the surface of the lake.  the "bird" was initially near the surface of the lake, i would estimate at a distance of one mile to the north-northeast.  the "bird" was rising slowly, flying in a tight upward spiral, counterclockwise as seen from above.  after awhile, i became increasingly puzzled, since the "gull" never deviated from the tight, rising spiral, as one would expect some randomness in the flight of a bird.  also, i noticed that the object flashed most brilliantly when it passed through the west side of its spiral, pointing somewhat in my direction, though the sun was of course in the east.  curious, i watched the object for some minutes, as it continuously spiraled upward.  i would guess it was eight to ten minutes.  eventually, i lost sight of the object at an elevation above the horizon of about 70 degrees, owing to eye strain and growing altitude.  given the object was initially about a mile away, and its elevation was eventually greater than 70 degrees, it's altitude can be calculated as about 14,500 feet, or 2 3/4 miles.  it would seem strange behavior for a bird to deliberately fly so high.  given 9 minutes, with the time of flight of about 0.15 hours:  2.75 miles / 0.15 hours = 18 miles per hour, vertical velocity.  also, the rate of rotation in the spiraling was about 30 revolutions / minute (2 seconds per revolution).  at no time did any sound come from the object.

in addition to the object being white, i had the impression that the brightness was primarily generated by the object, itself - that it was not reflected light.  as i mentioned, it went through a bright phase on the west side of its spiral, when it was visible to me.  there were very few people on the patio that morning, and i did not think to ask someone else to watch the object with me.  in retrospect, that is unfortunate.  but, i didn't realize i was watching something strange until the object had gained some altitude, such that it would have been difficult to locate anyway.
content.summary: Glowing object spirals up from lake for about nine minutes, to an altitude of about 2 3/4 miles.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the hill country of wimberley, tx about 45 minutes southwest of austin. it���s very rural out here so there is typically great sky visibility at night. last night, may 31st, 2008, my dog was a little restless and barking in the back yard so, i got up to check on him. it was about 11:30 pm. it was a really clear and peaceful night so, i decided to pull up my lounge chair and star watch for a bit. no sooner had i sat down and leaned back when i spotted three white, star-like lights moving east to west across the sky in a fixed triangle formation. it was an uneven triangle with the two longer, equal sides leading. the lights were solid and did not blink or twinkle. they moved in a straight and unwavering path at a fixed speed comparable to the speed of typical air traffic. the altitude was at least 30,000 ft or more, maybe higher than most of the commercial planes that have a path in this area. distance-wise, this is all just a rough estimate but, to the eye, the lights appeared to be an inch or so from each other. i cannot say for certain if the lights were separate objects or corners of one singular craft as i couldn���t make out any other details.  also, i know it may have helped but, in the moment i didn���t notice if other stars behind it were being obscured or not when it passed. i watched this formation cross the sky for over a minute or so until it was finally out of sight. anyway, i really don���t think this was 3 satellites moving in unison. i don���t think this was 3 planes or military jets moving in unison as you can generally always see flashing lights & hear them. all was silent before, during and after this thing passed.
with all said, it was pretty amazing to see something like this even though it was a pretty tame sighting compared to many others with erratic behavior and whatnot.  if it were in fact one of the often reported ���black triangles��� then, this thing had to be huge based on the size it appeared to be at that distance. 
keep your eyes on the skies people! oh, and pay close attention to your pets. they may be trying to tell you that the mothership is in the 'hood. "bow wow wow yippy yo yippy yah! - george clinton
content.summary: Triangle formation passes over my neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
It was at about 11:30 at night i was texting my friend and i looked at my phone it was being reflected so i could see out the window and i saw a light it was about 1000-2500 feet in the air so at first i thought it was just a plane but i never thought planes were that low and it was silent   it was hovering and took off i do not think thats its an airplane or not a balloon or a helicopter other than this i havent told anybody else about this i heard about mufon on ufo hunters. 

it hovered and did some small movements but that was it. like from one place to another place 3-10 feet away. i was alrght with the object i was a little scared if it crashes.
content.summary: Light in sky not resembling aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
I was arriving back at my parents house in wenachee, wa with my sister.  we observed a large spotlight in the back of my grandparent's pasture, which was across the street from my parents land.  the light covered about an acre and was very bright.  everything this light touched in a white out.  you couldn't see the grass it was covering.
the spotlight traveled up the front of rooster rock and then traveled quickly over the methow hill to the r. rock's right.  the light then traveled back over the route again, back to where we first saw it.  it then shrunk down until there was no light left on the ground.
until now, all of this had been observed from the car in which we were traveling.
my sister and i arrived at our parents home almost as the light disappeared in my granparent's pasture.  we leaped out of the car looking up into the sky to see what could have created the spotlight on the ground.  there was a small while light in the sky that would have blended in with the stars had it not been moving quickly and zig-zaging.  it was in our view for about ten to fifteen seconds when it just winked out.  
my sister and i went inside and told my parents about it.
about eight to nine months later, i saw the same thing happen, only i was with one of my good friends.  the same senario happend, the hill being bathed in that bright light, only this time, we didn't observe anything in the sky.  i was glad when my friend saw it, because he didn't think my sister and i were crazy anymore.
the first time i saw the light, i thought it was a spotlight that was being used at a new shopping centre in my home town, but if it had come from there, wenatchee is in a valley, if the light had been able to reach my granparent's place from where that spotlight had been place, there would have been shadows.  it had to come from up above.
if i had known there were sites like this to tell my little story about what i had seen, i would have filled this form out eight and a half years ago!!!
content.summary: Saw a large spot light on the ground, when it disappeared there was a zig-zag light in the sky, then it vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing this letter to you after seeing a headline on aol news about stan romanek���s video footage of an alien outside of his window.  i watched a little bit of coverage of this on larry king on youtube.Com.  prompted by curiosity to find out more, i surfed the web to get some more information about his case.  after i saw his drawings and accounts of the orbs, i thought it might be worth something to at least notify someone involved with his case of some occurrences that have happened within the last year, mostly the end of summer and fall 2007.  they seem related to stan���s sleep-walking episodes of a hypnotized state involving the writing of unknown equations.  

in august, my sister had similar hypnotic experiences where she did not remember what she had written.  this occurred with progressive intensity during a five day (plus) episode where she did not sleep for many nights, eventually leading to her going to the hospital.  during some of this, she did have recollection ��� but her logic and way of speaking was very strange, as if she was awake in a dream-state of mind.  throughout, there were many drawings involving planetary alignments and other ���codes��� and symbols with numbers corresponding to dates and letters.  she spoke about shadows and orbs.  i witnessed strange noises outside of her window one night.  i was too scared to investigate further, as was she, and the two of us both ran out of the room.  she drew things on her body, as well, which were still there when we took her to the hospital.  one symbol bore resemblance to stan���s.

in addition to this strange experience, to which other events were related, i also have another friend who went through the same sleepless experience and ���figured out codes��� and described the episode with very similar language.  

if you have any information about this kind of ���code��� writing that might be of use to us (perhaps others who have experienced this too) we would appreciate your pointing us to something.
content.summary: Orbs and code during hypnotic state

content.detailedDescription: Honestly, not sure as to whether these might have been military fighter jets - but the circumstances surrounding this sighting seemed abnormal.  on a sunday night, i was outside walking my dog at an airport in southern ca up and down long hangar rows.  no moon, clear pitch black sky with many stars to be seen.  i'm always searching the skies for aeroplanes, so on this temperate, calm and quiet night i was looking up to see quite high in the sky - probably out of b class airspace - a gentle arc of what looked like about 0.5 - 1.0 miles in diameter of 7 single red lights - not flickering - all equidistant apart travelling very slowly north at what seemed could have been a complete north-south west coast surveyance. trailing behind these, i found only one red light at what looked like about 1 - 1.5 miles behind.  i strained my eyes to try to view the attached aircraft from which each red light shone, but i could not see anything. the slow, slow speed was interesting.  there was no sound, no hum or anything, plus it was really quiet at the airport.  i know fighters have rotating or strobe-like single red lights on their belly  as well as make some noise no matter how high, but these small red lights did not flash or rotate.  but as it moved, i did notice one or two of the lights on the outer edges phase out and then come in again.  i could tell it was very high indeed.  i could easily view from edge to edge. it moved on up the coast until it disappeared.  feelings wise:  i didn't want to  remove my eyes from the sky, as i thought it was really rather odd, unusual and highly interesting to me - as it was for my boyfriend. i went to the supermarket on the way home, and after coming out, i searched the skies again, and i did see them travelling in the (exact) opposite direction from which they originally came.  slowly, and equidistant apart, very wide and also very silent. also with the trailing red light.  they too, disappeared over the hills of palos verdes on their way toward san diego (i suppose). after getting home, i did tune in 600 and 640 am hoping some others may have seen the same thing. nothing. i also searched the web that evening - still nothing.  the next day i thought about it, i'd told a couple of people, but shortly thereafter, i'd forgotten it.  they seemed like they might have been some kind of military surveyancy that covered the west coast on this night. however after doing some research on my own, the sighting seemed to match those of many others - but at different times and different places, and i just thought i'd throw in my twopence. i'd really like to know if there is just anybody out there who visualized the same thing at around the same time i did.
content.summary: Night, 7 red lights separted equidistant in arc moving slowly south to north and back again.

content.detailedDescription: Sometime late during the month of march, 2004, at approximately 2000hrs, i observed what appeared to be a bright object falling at about a 45 degree angle towards the ground at a high rate of speed. i estimate that i was approximately 20-30 miles away. i was at the barracks where i had been quartered, talking to my family on the cell phone, when i saw a bright object falling from the sky. the object appeared to have two explosions during it's decent, though i could not hear them. it was not chaff from an aircraft, nor was it artillery fire, aerial gunnery fire, nor fireworks from the on-post fair which was about a quarter of a mile in front of my barracks. the explosions came from the object, and were bright enough to be seen in the night, with a high-visibility light source in front of the object (the fair), and a clear star-field behind the object. the location of where i saw the object was not near the ft stewart impact area, and there were no artillery units conducting night fire exercises that night. i did not hear any artillery or aerial gunnery fire that night. after the second explosion, the object disappeared. i initially thought that the object might have just been a falling star or asteroid, except that it did not have the usual characteristics of a falling star. it did not appear to have a trail of burning debris from it as it entered the atmosphere, streaking across the sky. it did not "burn-out" quickly, i watched it for about 30 seconds as it fell. i did not hear it impact the ground. there were no reports of a crash that happened locally in the news the next day. there are three airports in the surrounding area - wright army airfield, hunter army airfield, and savannah intl. airport.
content.summary: Probable ufo sighting over  or near ft stewart, ga

content.detailedDescription: I was a kid, around nine years old, living on long island on a summer afternoon. i was playing in my backyard, when i heard police sirens and looked through the yard that backed mine to see a police car pull up in front of their house.  i then saw movement up and to my left.  it appeared to be a classic saucer shaped craft, coming up from the yard.  it was silent and took off really fast.  i would estimate it at about 20 feet in diameter.  i ran into my house and told my mom, who said that i imagined it, and not to tell anyone.  years later, i asked her about it, and she said it was obvious that i had seen something, and that it shook her up.  i recall this clearly to this day, and could still draw what i saw.
content.summary: I've always wondered... what did i see?

content.detailedDescription: I was with 3 other friends we thought lets go hang on a bridge we was messing about and it was going dark one of my friends said hey whats that so we all looked up and there it was a bright white light and it was low and there was no noise then it dissapeared then a plane went same way and it was higher than the ufo and we could here the plane but not this white light even tho it was lower then i tryed to recorded it and i did then i said keep and eye open because there might be another 2 2of my frineds went walking and me and another friend was watching the first ufo on my phone and when it finshed i looked up and there was another 2 but the thing was one was white and one was orange i tryed to recorded them i did but i cant see them and they were same height as the first one and there was no noise still so what could they be??????
content.summary: Looked up saw light  recorded it few ins after another 2 came try recorded it

content.detailedDescription: Late night,  messing around with wife then she fell asleep somthing started engaging in some sexual way with her, could not see it, could hear it walk, floor would creak, next night were playing cards &  we had pants off it was stimulating us at table, & would pop up 4 a split second, seemed very interested in pleasuring my wife, & she liked it almost like she was posessed by it.
content.summary: Alien encounter at our apartment,  4 days,

content.detailedDescription: Ok it was about 2 am central time here in marion,ar.I was siting out back near my pond just relaxing,i was looking straight across the pond when something flashed real bright in the sky and caught my attention.After the flash i looked up and saw a bright blue light,like a circle of light.It was at a fairly low alttitude( i think )and it was moving very fast!From when i saw it to the far west up in the sky ,to when it was out of my sight heading straight east, it only took it about 3 seconds to fly across my whole field of vision! i mean this thing must have been doing like 10k mph! also it made no sound! thats the weird part. i figure at the low alt it was flying,and that speed, if it was a jet it would have broke the sound barrier and been very loud.Also im not sure if it was blinking and if was just going through the clouds(it was pretty cloudy that night),but it basicly lit up 3 times befor going out of my line of sight. i think maybe it just looked like it was blinking and it was going through some clouds.But i could see the super bright glow of this thing on the nearby clouds, anyway i dont think it was a plane/helicopter/or anything i could explain.Remeber very fast....No noise! it kinda freaked me out.I have been looking out back everyday to see if i can see it agin.If anyone who reads this saw anything weird around my area at any time.Please post something on here and let me know, i want to keep trak of sightings of u.F.O's in my area from now on, thanks.Any questions you can e mail me also.
content.summary: Bright blue round light---moving very fast---and silent.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on my front porch watching a plane fly in the distance, a extremely bright light caught my eye, i looked up and there was a narrow triangle glowing the purest white light that it was almost a powder blue. it was as if the light was enclosed in glass and glowing inside and all around it. it didn't distract the shape of the craft as most bright lights do.  no blinking lights, no sound, just the glow. i watched it for 3 to 4 minutes in amazement. it was traveling east. the plane i was watching previously was heading north and the object passed in front of it, the plane turned east afterwards as if to follow it. 
it didn't seem any bigger then a normal plane, and about the same distance up as normal aircraft would fly. it really is hard to determine distance at night though. as it was traveling through, the tree's did block my view at the end.
i've never known an airplane to glow like that. 
i would love to know if anyone else has seen this.
content.summary: Bright glowing narrow triangle silently gliding through night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back patio and out of the corner of my husbands eye saw a object so we stood up and we both saw a blurry object traveling way faster than a plane going from west to east making no sound. it traveled the length of our house in less than five seconds. a plane going from south west to north east followed about ten seconds behind it, it was going much slower than the object we saw.
content.summary: Going from west to east, blurry chevron looking object.

content.detailedDescription:
February 7, 1967, a group of 5 of us ventured north from georgia southern college to attend a high school basketball game near athens, georgia. it was after midnight that we were returning back to statesboro on a southerly route and we were in violation of strict dormitory curfew. i was sitting in the middle of the backseat of a 2-door 1966 plymouth fury ii with my head leaning back and peering into the black country sky that seemed to be filled with stars. i was searching the air for uao's. nicap had said to watch for lights moving east to west. i was looking to my left when a bright light caught my eye in the distance and it was moving westward at a 90 degree angle to our route. despite the speed of the car, i was able to focus on this light and noticed that the surrounding stars were blacked out momentarily around it while it moved as if obstructed. i had already told the guys that i would be looking for something in the sky and shouted for the driver to stop. it was a state route, but we were the only ones on the road there. we stopped in the middle of the road and all 5 of us got out and shut off the motor, leaving the doors open. we were just watching this light continue on its path towards us. there was absolute quiet with no other ground lights around. at one point a dog barking in the distance was the only noise except for a whispered comment or two from one of us. i estimate we stood there at least 5 minutes total, maybe more, because one of the guys crossed a ditch to a fence and took a leak and then came back to watch the light. within a minute or two, the object passed overhead, but instead of continuing its silent path, it stalled above us. now all of us are looking straight up above the car. the light was directly above, still no noise. then the white light seemed to grow larger and larger. then the edges of the light came more sharply into focus and i could clearly see a triangular shape - the light, that is. it was as if the cover of a bank of fluorescent ceiling lights was shaped like a triangle. i said, "the thing's getting bigger", but one of the others said, "hell no, it's getting closer. it's coming down!" at this point, we all panicked and dove into the car and sped on down the road. looking behind us we could now see the light moving back eastward, not to the west as it had been and it was now to our left again as when i first observed it. it still appeared to move slowly by our perspective but it had to have been moving faster than us because although it was further away than before, now it caught up with and seemed to be cruising parallel to us. i understand that no road is perfectly straight and that's why a stationary object like the moon can appear to change positions, but 4 of us were watching this thing. it never got ahead of us and it never came towards us again. about 10 minutes after we had fled, the white light changed gradually to red in a few seconds, and then suddenly disappeared, not zipping away, but just vanished like when you turn out a light. how close was it when we were standing in the road? no idea. to demonstrate, i would hold my hands above my head, touch my thumbs together and my index fingers together to form a triangle and say that's how big it looked before i caved. this was not venus or the moon. i knew how to triangulate points in the sky, but by the time we first exited the car, there was no need to do that. this thing was moving. we never reported it. 

exactly 2 weeks later on the 21st, i seemed to be the only one interested in rehashing that night. it was just beginning to get dark. three of us were walking to the edge of the campus where our p.O. boxes and a dairy queen were located. bob had been one of the 5 in the car. he was with me and another guy and i was re-telling the tale to this third guy, using bob as a witness. actually by this time, the other 3 that had been in the car wanted me to just stfu about it but i couldn't let it go. we were standing at a traffic light across the street from a store on the opposite corner and i was right in the middle of talking about it. behind the store was a small stand of trees. directly across the crosswalk on that corner was a similar stand of trees. behind those, less than 50 feet away, was the large parking area that had the post office and dq. there was a sudden rush of wind. the noise of wind came from the left. we could clearly see a maybe 40 foot long "craft" of some kind whooshing by at what was maybe 40-50 miles per hour, above and behind the corner store and behind, but not higher than, the stand of trees. there was no engine sound, only the rush of wind, and what sounded like something metal flapping against something metal. there were sections of light on the side we could see that did not look like running lights, but gave the impression of a row of windows with the visible light coming from within. i ran across the street past the trees and into the open parking area and stood directly behind the path of this thing as it moved away. the parking area bordered a large field that had few trees and the thing was now moving over it. one of the other guys reached the parking area and was behind me. from this perspective, all we could see was a an object moving away from us in a straight line. just as quickly, this object appeared to suddenly move up 90 degrees for a second, then back down 90 degrees to the same path it had been on and continued to move straight away from us. it repeated this same maneuver twice more, until it was too far away to be visible. each of the 3 times it did that, bits of light that looked like flames shot out of it and sprinkled down on the downturn, but faded before they got to the ground. 

in the event of feb. 7, when i first saw it i was suspicious because it was the largest light in the sky but i tried to remain objective. when i realized it was blotting out "surrounding" stars, i knew this was a large moving object that was closer to the ground than conventional aircraft, which could only achieve that effect by flying at a very low and impossible altitude. though i did not know very much about large balloons or blimps at the time, i do know now that these would be equipped with some type of "running lights", not one single white light that shown downward, and they would not be out at night. also since there was absolutely no sound, no balloon can arbitrarily stop above a given spot, then change direction and speed up. we were all very frightened at the time until the object blinked out.

the event that happened exactly 2 weeks later - if i had not been discussing ufo's/uao's at the very moment of its appearance, i might have thought at first it was a low flying plane, although dangerously low, but there was no noise of a motor. after the action of the object, i was more than convinced this was no conventional aircraft. my feelings were of frustration because the guys i was with both times, one of whom was present at both events like me, didn't seem all that concerned with it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 events in 2 weeks - 1967. ist triangular shape, no noise. 2nd cigar shape - wind and clanking noise.

content.detailedDescription: It was tuesday 5-27-08 in naples florida. it was my day off and i was sitting on my patio looking at the sunny blue sky when i saw a star flashing light very high in the sky. i could not make out a shape it was flashing light like a mirror. i thought i was seeing things, i took video and my camera picked up nothing. the clouds rolled in over that spot i saw it for about 2 minutes and then the clouds rolled in.  there has been what looks like a satelittes every night but they show up in different areas of the night sky and flash different colors. the colors kind of band around the spot and flash as well. i wonder if these things are related? i have been seeing strange things in the sky and never saw these things before. i lived on the east coast of florida for 20 years and have lived here for 3 years and have seen more weird lights and such here than i have seen in all my 42 years i have lived. it really is i believe a hot spot for this kind of thing. but then mufon probably already knows that? huh? lol thanks for hearing this story it is hard to get people to understand what i am seeing lately is strange and not airplanes!
content.summary: Reflecting star like image in blue sky reflecting like a star

content.detailedDescription: My friend was driving from arlington tx. to irving tx. when i saw 3 objects flying eraticly. they moved in ways that i have never seen. we stopped the car and stood on top of it. we both started praying outloud. "god please protect us!" i felt they were somehow threatening. so we prayed. it lasted maby 5 or 6 mi nuits. we got back in our car & went straight 2 my moms as she was closest. as soon as we opened the door she said, "what happened 2 u!! u look like u seen a gohst!!"as my mom requested i called trou duncan, our weatherman. hee said if anything was reported or seen he would put it on the nights news. but no story. iv'e tried 2 tell myself that theres a logical explanation but this experience has haunted me 4 yrs.
content.summary: I saw 3 objects, moving eraticlysp? they seemed 2 b communicating w/ one another. icalled my local wether man

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying down in my west covina home in loa angeles on the hammock looking at the night sky. then all of a sudden i saw a large triangle in the formation of a v flying at about 30 thousand feet. (guesstimate) with lights from the tip of the v to the end of each tail. at first i thought it was birds flying. as it was full moon and i thought that the moon light was reflecting off of the birds. but then when i got up i saw this v flying from south to north east and it was very large. i would say about 3-4 miles long. then i knew this is a ufo, alien ship. we have no technology to build something like this. everynight i have been laying in the same spot but so far this flying object never returned. does anyone have any idea what i have seen? hope to hear from you. 

perry
content.summary: Large triangle with lights from the tip to the end .

content.detailedDescription: Over the past four years or so, i have probably seen this thing four times. if i wake up in the middle of the night, maybe around 4:00 - 4:30 am to go to the bathroom, my eye catches an enormous bright, white light over the building across from mine.  i live at 293 turnpike road (rt. 9) in westborought, ma. i am on the 8th floor and looking out my bedroom window, facing probably northeast (east on rt. 9) and over the building across from mine (#295 turnpike road) i have seen this light.  the first time i saw it it was hovering just over the roof of the building, probably a full apratment and one-half long.  it was in the winter and i wondered if it was the glow from a heater on the building or something.  i watched it for maybe 10 minutes to see if it would move, and it did not.  it did not seem to come closer or move side to side.  it was odd and i wanted to watch it more but raced to the bathroom.  when i quickly returned to see if it was still there, it had disappeared.  being so odd, from time to time if i wake up to use the bathroom (usually around the same time) i look out to see if it is there.  i have seen it maybe two or three times more, but not directly over the building as if it were going to land on it, but higher in the sky, maybe as high as a helicopter might fly but still directly over the building in front of my apartment building.  each time i stand or sit and watch it to see if it will move and it does not.  it is very odd.  each and every time i run to the bathroom and return to continue watching it, but it is gone.  the last time i saw it was probably may 23, 2008.  if i should ever see it again i am going pay more attention to the time of night, and length, etc. it is hard to believe that ther is no one in my large building who has not seen this too.  i have not told anyone about it because they will laugh it off or think i am crazy; but it certainly is curious to me.  on the other side of the building is a large parking lot with a mcdonald's and a wal-mart.  neither are open at that time.  and beyond the wal-mart is a good size grassy hill.  i cannot see the parking lot nor the wal-mart and mcdonald's from my 8th floor, but i can see the top of the large hill beyond them.  sometimes there are flickerings of bright light in the bush there at that time of night also.  during the day i have looked with bonoculars and i think there is a small road on the hill and maybe a couple of street lights, but i am not sure who goes up and down that road at 4:00 am.  those small flickering lights are not the same as this giant light suspended in the sky.  i know this is not a real interesting ufo story as some people have, but i am sure interested in what this thing is that disappears when i leave the room as if it waits for me to do so.  i am a middle-aged woman and i worked sixteen years as a teacher.  i have been a psychotherapist for twenty additional years.  i have three master's degrees, a cags, and i am working on my doctorate. i tell you this because i am a professinal person who knows reality from fantasy.
content.summary: Extremely large, oval, very bright white light remains in one position until i leave the room for 30 sec. and then it disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
During the mid summer of about 1977, a friend and i were fishing on the bank of the san joaquin river, approximately 1/4 mile west of "korths's pirate lair" marina on twtichell island levee rd road. it had to be either a friday or saturday night, as we went there each weekend when we were teens. we were facing the shipping channel, south to south/west.  

it was around 10-11 pm, and we both noticed two very bright white lights, zipping through the sky, turning at right angles but not stopping.  almost as if bouncing like in the old video game "pong".  i couldn't determine any shape, they just appeared as a bright white light - like a very bright star.  i have no way to determine their distance from us, but would guess they were near the altitude commercial aircraft fly at (30,000').

they made several darts across the sky, then slower they headed towards each other, and became one.  maybe a second or two later the single light just took off, accellerating extremely fast fading away.  that happened very quickly. it frightened me actually.  they entire thing lasted maybe 5-10 seconds.

we both just sat there for several minutes, not saying a word before i asked him "did you see that?"  he said, yeah.

we never talked about it, and it was only maybe 5-years ago when i told my brother & his wife.

while watching some type of ufo tv show about 5 years ago (~2005), i saw the same looking lights captured on video performing that same pattern (can't recall if they joined together at the end though).
content.summary: Fishing on the bank of the the san joaquin river facing my friend and i noticed 2 lights zipping through the sky at right angles, then they joined to gether as one, and took off very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I found this on u-tub.  not sure if this is real but video looked real.
content.summary: 2 ufo spoted in saudi

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of the bar to go home, i looked up & saw three lights in the sky.  someone said "whats that?". i said "i dont know" several of us stood there & wathed it. i kept taking pictures other ppl were taking pictures too.  the lights moved seemingly independent of eash other. two lights faded away one stayed longer. as the other light was moving away, a small airplane flew into that airspace (so it seemed to me). after it was over i definately felt that i had seen something strange.
content.summary: Three white lights in the shape of a triangle moved independently, 2 faded away, one lingered then left.

content.detailedDescription:
In yard at house cross streets in tucson az. ne of u of a about 5 miles.
ft lowell/dodge



i noticed a metallic object not moving at first glance extremely high.
smaller and higher than any commercial aircraft because it seemed very high.
it's hard enough to see very high aircraft sometimes but this appeared even much higher in a clear sky.After noticing the chemtrail moving either by wind or earth rotation, the object was making a ssw to nnw path with no trail.
it did not deviate path but very slowly after perhaps 45 minutes it became invisible to my naked eye.
at closest point to me when first noticed i used small 8 power binos and instablity made it hard to really notice shape.
i concluded it must be a space station or satellite as it was stainless  steel color and cigar shaped standing on end with a appendage like an outside tank half as large as ufo.
i concluded it must be satellite or space station.
my only doubt was that i would be able to see a manmade object in orbit that high during daylight.
i ve seen the shuttle blaze thru eastern phoenix some 6 years ago on a re entry so that moved pretty fast in comparison.
as mentioned, the object was very stationary and seemed the earths rotation was the reason of increasing distance.
what do you think? huh? 

jay
content.summary: Noticed a chemtrail and saw very high a possible satellite

content.detailedDescription:
On october 30,2008 around 6pm i was on my way home from visiting my cousin after work. i was traveling northbound
on us/95 when i reached my exit at ann rd. as i was waiting on the exit ramp i noticed a black military plane coming from nellis afb at
a very low altitude coming directly towards where i was. by the time it made it to the area above me i was making a left turn onto the first 
street which is tenaya. i thought it was a little strange that this military plane was flying so low in this particlar area and as slowly as it was.
as i continued onto tenaya i kept my eyes on the plane and noticed it started to turn to the right as if it was heading towards the apartment complex
where i was living at the time. as i drove around the curve before you get to the apartments i could still see the plane flying slowly as if it were looking for something.	
also as i was going through the curve i also notice a black disc shaped object sitting completely still in the air over the apartment complex. i thought to myself nah that 
cant be what i think it is. so i sped up a little and turned in the driveway hoping to get a better look. when i made the turn i noticed a helicopter sitting to the
left of the driveway with to young looking military guys standing in the doorway of the chopper. they were standing there with their eyes glued on the object. 	
from my position on the ground the buildings were blocking my view of the object so i drove up past the buildings on my left and there i got a very clear and close up
unblocked view of the object. i sat there looking at the object trying to make sure i was seeing what i was seeing and it was indeed a spacecraft. i looked at the time on my dashborad
and it was 6:27pm. i started to look for my cell phone to call my wife and tell her to come outside to see it but could not find my phone. about this time the plane and the
helicopter had gotten closer to the object. the plane began to circle in rather close to the object as if it were trying to provoke the object to leave. i was so excited as i was watching
i wanted my wife to see so i sped off to go get her. as i was running upstairs i could still hear the helicopter but by the time i got her outside i could not hear the helicopter anymore.
by the time we made it back to the area where i saw this event taking place everything was gone. i could understand the object being gone and completely out of site but the helicopter for sure should have been 
in site somewhere in the general area. but all three were gone without a trace. there was one guy who was outside putting something in his truck and he seemed not to pay any of this any attention. i saw him maybe twice
since the incident but i was too shy to go up and ask him if he saw it too because i know he should have. there was also two very young kids standing next to the building that the object was directly above. i couldnt see 
their faces because they had their backs to me facing the object. but the guy that was at his truck i saw his face clearly and we made eye contact. he did have a look on his face that seemed to be saying "yeah right" as though
he saw it but was not impressed. i wish i would have had enough courage to go up to him and ask him if he saw the same thing i saw. but reguardless i know that what i was looking at was as real as anything i have ever seen with
my two eyes. the drawing is the last scene i saw before i drove off. and the picture is of the exact location the object was. it was sitting over the building at the end of the street at about 75 to 100 ft with no lights or motion.
content.summary: Black and copper colored disc  with a top resembling a sewer top because of the notches on the top.
